description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Health Services assigns a nurse to every school site to assist students with health conditions or special education plans. A school may have a nurse for 8 to 40 hours a week depending on its needs. Nurses conduct special education assessments, state-mandated hearing and vision screenings, and refer families to other agencies. Health Services is a ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4wonz26xnwa4d2o2bjXd1H","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Community Schools","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"entry-hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" service.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
